about_the_game:
A shooting simulator for the HTC Vive / Oculus Rift / Oculus Quest.

The VR Arcade Shooting Range Mix speed and accuracy to turn into a crazy shooting expert!

Shoot, change guns, shoot again. Comfortable.

More weapons are coming in future updates. Every elite shooter must find their perfect weapon. Pick your favorite gun.

Featuring four guns for now, and score tracking / ranking.

Easy to handle...
... but hard to win No.1

In the game, the player can choose one of the four guns for target shooting. After the bullets are consumed, the player will get his current score and record it in the ranking of the corresponding firearm. The player can choose himself unlimited times Favorite gun to play the game

name: VR Shooting Range: Multiple Weapons

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy VR Shooting Range: Multiple Weapons

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio

short_description: The VR Arcade Shooting Range Mix speed and accuracy to turn into a crazy shooting expert!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Arabic, Korean
